home.heroText: Gattabara Games is a video game company and creative studio headquartered in Bengaluru, India.

curatedPartnerships.description: GG crafts games internally from the ground up and selectively backs bold creators through a co-ownership model that aligns authorship, artistry, and equity. We pair experimental design with distinctive art direction, preserving creative independence while building fun, commercially strong games that can scale globally.

games.description: Step into a lovingly crafted retro anime world as explorers Maki and Omura brave the deadly Storm Wall and the perils beyond, all to save their home. In this 2-player co-op puzzle adventure, only brains, heart and unyielding resolve will open the path forward.

A sci-fi mystery set on the repurposed moon hotel Samsara. Uncover cryptic experiments, face unsettling encounters, and piece together a mind-bending narrative. The deeper you go, the more the truth unravels as you confront the ultimate question: What is reality?

A dying world, flesh given way to steel. Swarms of corrupted mech-monsters roam a desolate land. Search and destroy, scavenge and dismantle, rebuild yourself from the wreckage. What you take becomes what you are. Survive the wasteland. Make it to Highpoint.

Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

ggProductions.heroTagline: Build faster. Ship smarter. Stay lean.
ggProductions.introText: At GG Productions, we know what it’s like to build games with tight budgets and big ambitions. Every decision is about momentum, what to build now, what to defer, and where the right support can help you move faster. Our outsourcing model is built to help studios stay lean while shipping at a professional standard, with clear milestones and transparent delivery. We integrate as an extension of your team, whether for full production or focused co-development, so you can move fast without losing control of your vision.

services.title: Development
services.description: We help studios build games from concept to playable reality through strong game design, systems architecture, and technical execution. Our teams support gameplay mechanics, level design, prototyping, and full production across Unity, Unreal, and Roblox, building scalable foundations that support long-term growth and live operations.

services.title: Art
services.description: We create distinctive visuals through strong art direction and production. From style exploration to full world-building, our artists deliver cohesive 2D and 3D visuals, animation, and UI that bring characters and worlds to life with a clear creative vision aligned to your gameplay and audience.

services.title: Strategy & Pre-Production
services.description: We help studios de-risk production and validate ideas before full development. Our support spans IP creation consultancy, MVP planning for fundraising, game design documentation for investors and partners, and data-driven decision-making across entertainment, branded experiences, and applied games to align creative ambition with market and production realities.

projects.description: A high-performance technical co-development project focusing on scalable backend systems and immersive environment art. We implemented custom shader solutions and optimized the rendering pipeline for mobile devices.

Full-cycle art production for a stylized fantasy RPG. Our artists delivered a cohesive visual identity, including character design, environment kits, and custom VFX for a vibrant, hand-painted aesthetic.
Technical co-development and UI/UX overhaul for a cyberpunk racing title. We optimized the car physics engine and designed a futuristic, high-performance interface for seamless player immersion.
Backend infrastructure and multiplayer networking for a competitive shooter. We built a scalable matchmaking system and high-tick-rate servers to ensure low-latency gameplay for a global player base.

introText: Gattabara Games is an AI-powered game studio built for bold worlds and ambitious founders. We don’t just ship products — we co-create universes. Through deep collaboration with visionary teams, we share ownership, shape strategy, and build alongside you from concept to scale. We operate independently, move fast, and fuse AI with design to craft experiences that are immersive, scalable, and commercially dominant.

We’ve spent serious time defining what we stand for. Our values aren’t filler — they guide every mechanic we design, every system we architect, and every decision we make. We evolve constantly, but these principles are our core engine.

values.title: Curiosity, creativity and intellectual agility
values.description: Original thinking and collaboration are at the core of the organization. Strong voices and unique ideas are valued in everything we do.

values.title: Savoir Faire
values.description: We celebrate people who take pride in their craft, giving them the space to improve, the resources to flourish, and opportunities to share their expertise.

values.title: Supporting and elevating each other
values.description: We nurture a vibrant, inclusive community where people feel safe, respected and empowered.
